articles.summary: Insider Monkey: Truist Flags Autonomous Driving Volatility Despite Higher Tesla (TSLA) Price Target. Tesla, Inc. (NASDAQ:TSLA) is one of the AI Stocks in the Spotlight for Investors. On December 19, Truist Securities raised its price target on the stock to $444.00 from $406.00 while maintaining a “Hold” rating.
